page.title: 16A TYPICAL SATURDAY.
page.content: On{Saturday}I get up at 9.00 a.m., have a wash, get dressed and have my breakfast. Then my dad gives me my {spending money}and I catch the bus to town. I go to Chantry Video shop and I rent four Atari games. Then I go home and play on my Atari for two hours. Later I go up{Bramley}to see my cousin and I play on his{computer}with him. We have our dinner. I go home about 5.00 p.m. and I have my tea. Then, sometimes my freinds and I play {football.}Then I come in at 9.00 o'clock and watch the{T.V.}until 11.00p.m.. Sometimes on Saturday our Leigh's friend sleeps at our house. I brush my teeth before I go to bed every night.
